snippet: Ralph Waite is on the road more than Willy Loman -- because Ralph Waite is Willy Loman.    Mr. Waite, an actor best known for his gig as Pa in ''The Waltons,'' the old television series, is starring as the beaten-by-life traveling man in a New Jer...
lead_paragraph: Ralph Waite is on the road more than Willy Loman -- because Ralph Waite is Willy Loman. Mr. Waite, an actor best known for his gig as Pa in ''The Waltons,'' the old television series, is starring as the beaten-by-life traveling man in a New Jersey production of Arthur Miller's classically tragic ''Death of a Salesman.''
abstract: Comment on efforts of Ralph Waite, actor known for role of Pa in Waltons television series, to win California House seat of late US Republican Repr Sonny Bono; photo (S)

headline.main: Political Briefing; 'Waltons' Star Sells Himself on 2 Coasts
